channel.title: Help changing News colors and report colors
channel.description: On my server it says what ever the news thing says like please vote or whatever. i know how to change color can someone give me some good codes tho and tell me the colors atm they are super light and can barley see them.

item.title: Help changing News colors and report colors
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

jesus pkz:

On my server it says what ever the news thing says like please vote or whatever. i know how to change color can someone give me some good codes tho and tell me the colors atm they are super light and can barley see them.

Here are some basic codes:
Red: 16711680
Green: 65280
Blue: 225
Purple: 12023295

Read full topic
item.source: Help changing News colors and report colors
